overview: Smokie Gold 40th Anniversary Edition DVD is a definitive anthology.  it contains footage of the official video clips of the hit singles as well as footage from TV pop shows like: Disco, Top Of the Pops, Crackerjack, Countdown, Old Grey Whistle Test, Supersonic and many others. Plus interviews, documentaries and live shows, including: East Berlin in 1976 and Sofia in 1983 and others.
title: Smokie Gold 1975-2015 40th Anniversary Edition
